page.title: 08SATURDAY AFTERNOON B/BRIGGS
page.content:
{Saturday Afternoon}
In the afternoon my brother Anthony takes one of the many buses which pass regularly through Bishopbriggs into Glasgow. This is the advantage of living in a suburb near a city, you can enjoy all a city has to offer while still living in a rural environment. At 1:30pm. my dad and I go to Celtic Park in Glasgow to watch football. We travel by taxi as it is cheaper and quicker than travelling on various buses. My gran, mum, and sister take a train into Glasgow to shop in the many department stores which can be found there.
